item.title: Report: Donors to Trump’s White House ballroom have $279B in federal contracts
item.description: The White House ballroom’s donor list contains heavyweights in the tech, financial and defense sectors, including Google, Comcast and Lockheed Martin.

item.title: Five key moments from Trump’s ‘60 Minutes’ interview
item.description: President Donald Trump discussed immigration raids, Venezuela and the government shutdown in a wide-ranging interview on the CBS show.

item.title: These states could redistrict before the 2026 midterms
item.description: As Trump pushes for a more Republican-friendly House map, more than half a dozen states are potential targets for mid-decade tweaks to congressional b...

item.title: Why Democrats are nervous about the New Jersey governor’s race
item.description: GOP candidate Jack Ciattarelli hopes for improved Black and Latino support against Democratic rival Mikie Sherrill.

item.title: Poll finds most Americans doubt Trump’s commitment to free speech, fair justice
item.description: The American people also don’t seem to know quite what to make of the criminal cases against two of Trump’s perceived opponents.
